entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light before morning. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:46 PM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. High 11 except 7 near Lake Erie.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing near noon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. High 11 except 7 near Lake Erie. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 3:46 PM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 40%
